name: Flights of the Imagination #6
description:
What if the window of an abandoned mining shack in the middle of a desert were a window into another dimension? That’s what this series is all about. This one allows you to gaze out a flock of birds photographed 2,000 miles away.   


About the View Portals
The digital frame that contains the image of the mining shack wall was abstracted from wooden crates that I photographed at a construction site. I thought that the rough timber nicely complemented the wooden remains of the window frame. A portal within a portal.
